briefTitle: Study of Embeda (Kadian NT, ALO-01) in Subjects With Chronic Moderate to Severe Nonmalignant Pain
officialTitle: A Long-Term, Open-Label Safety Study of ALO-01 (Morphine Sulfate Plus Naltrexone Hydrochloride Extended-Release) Capsules in Subjects With Chronic Moderate to Severe Nonmalignant Pain

interventions.name: ALO-01 (Morphine Sulfate Plus Naltrexone Hydrochloride ER)

summary: Open-Label, Safety Study to evaluate the long-term safety of Kadian NT (ALO-01) administered for up to 12 months.

primaryOutcome.measure: Subjects With Treatment Emergent Adverse Events
